splash_title: The Wasmi for Activities and Clubs
title1: Al-Wasmi for Activities and Clubs welcomes you
desc1:
Find all your house needs in one place. 
 We provide every service to make your home experience smooth.
desc2: We have the best in class individuals working just for you. They are well  trained and capable of handling anything you need.
desc3:
We have all the household services 
you need on a daily basis with
 easy access
